title: test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering fails with rails-dom-testing v2.3.0
body:
Managed to reproduce CI failure at https://buildkite.com/rails/rails-nightly/builds/2253#0196ef7f-b098-46dc-928f-46c83bc5758e/1244-2491 and found `CollectionCacheTest#test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering` fails with rails-dom-testing v2.3.0

### Steps to reproduce

```ruby
git clone https://github.com/rails/rails
cd rails/actionpack
bundle install
bundle info rails-dom-testing
bin/test test/controller/caching_test.rb -n test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering # make sure this test passes with rails-dom-testing v2.2.0
bundle update rails-dom-testing --conservative
bundle info rails-dom-testing
bin/test test/controller/caching_test.rb -n test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering
```

### Expected behavior
It should pass.

### Actual behavior
It fails as follows.

```ruby
$ git diff
diff --git a/Gemfile.lock b/Gemfile.lock
index 80db1f5673..cae71adb2a 100644
--- a/Gemfile.lock
+++ b/Gemfile.lock
@@ -469,7 +469,7 @@ GEM
       rack (>= 1.3)
     rackup (2.2.1)
       rack (>= 3)
-    rails-dom-testing (2.2.0)
+    rails-dom-testing (2.3.0)
       activesupport (>= 5.0.0)
       minitest
       nokogiri (>= 1.6)
$ bin/test test/controller/caching_test.rb -n test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering
Running 32 tests in a single process (parallelization threshold is 50)
Run options: -n test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering --seed 47461

# Running:

F

Failure:
CollectionCacheTest#test_preserves_order_when_reading_from_cache_plus_rendering [test/controller/caching_test.rb:417]:
--- expected
+++ actual
@@ -1,3 +1 @@
-"david, 1
-  david, 2
-  david, 3"
+"david, 1 david, 2 david, 3"
.
Expected 0 to be >= 1.


bin/test test/controller/caching_test.rb:410



Finished in 0.084326s, 11.8587 runs/s, 47.4349 assertions/s.
1 runs, 4 assertions, 1 failures, 0 errors, 0 skips
$
```


### System configuration

**Rails version**:  main branch

**Ruby version**: ruby 3.4.4 (2025-05-14 revision a38531fd3f) +PRISM [x86_64-linux]
